subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Curious!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hey Frank-R;

Yahoo marked your message as spam, and I can't go approve it from here at 
work. But anyway, I don't know if I should name names, in an attempt to be a 
nicer bitch. I don't get it, I made the damn things, gave them away free, 
yet I can't be trusted to fix it, or at least verify the box works for me. I 
think there may indeed be a limit, or at least a certain state of mind for 
users. So I guess these people are left with ugly little door stops? I tried 
to e-mail  but one e-mail came back, the other ignored,  so I'm thinkin' 
blocked maybe, which does not show they are anymore honest then the user 
they all hate------without naming names. BTW-Steve's not one of these 
people.


This probably sounds vague, but they know who they are, and I don't get a 
response any other way, so probably a mis-use of the group, sorta.


I didn't realize just how crappy car tuners were until I got the homebrew 
tuner working. I don't have anywhere near the static and noise in the HB 
tuner.


  Frank-S

_________________________________________________________________
A new home for Mom, no cleanup required. All starts here.
